snippet.title: Apastron Episode 1 Launch Trailer
snippet.description:
Apastron launches on steam Aug 18th 2020!

https://store.steampowered.com/app/1264850/Apastron/

Apastron is a retro styled Fps made independently by @noah.lewin.williams 

Plot : 
You're a defender reborn every generation. Your overseer the Apastron restores you (Phoebe Harper) to discover the plot against the drowning planet Coelho.  The last Metropolis on the planet Central 98 is being occupied by the Forever Corporation. Phoebe must use her last granted life to correct the mistakes of her past, and save Coelho in the process.

Thanks for checking out my game! If you like what you saw consider supporting me by getting the game or checking out my other work :
https://www.indiedb.com/members/noah-w
~ N
